name: Shootin' Putin
overview: Shootin' Putin is a funny crosshair shooter in which the goal is to shoot pictures of Russian president Vladimir Putin. The game is actually playable with both a joystick, or a Commodore 64 compatible light gun (providing you actually have a CRT display) This game was developed by German coder Jörg Heyltjes and released to the public domain on December 29, 2014.
